scripts.start: npm run bs | npm run watch | npm run sass
scripts.sass: node-sass src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css && node-sass src/scss/about.scss dist/css/about.css && node-sass src/scss/projects.scss dist/css/projects.css && node-sass src/scss/contact.scss dist/css/contact.css && node-sass src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.css -w src/scss && node-sass src/scss/about.scss dist/css/about.css -w src/scss && node-sass src/scss/projects.scss dist/css/projects.css -w src/scss && node-sass src/scss/contact.scss dist/css/contact.css -w src/scss
scripts.partials: html-include-comment src/index.html dist/index.html && html-include-comment src/about.html dist/about.html && html-include-comment src/projects.html dist/projects.html && html-include-comment src/contact.html dist/contact.html
